channel.title: Windows 7 + moparscape/clients = dont work
channel.description:
When ever I try to connect to a server, it takes a long period says "connecting to server" but then says "error connecting to server"
I have the latest version of java and the server is online. Please help me!

item.title: Windows 7 + moparscape/clients = dont work
item.dc:creator: @Skaternerd7 Skaternerd7
item.description:
@Skaternerd7 wrote:

i don’t really know what else to tell you, but to aid you in getting help… BUMP!

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 + moparscape/clients = dont work
item.dc:creator: @Skaternerd7 Skaternerd7
item.description:
@Skaternerd7 wrote:

  1. You need to set 2 identical paths, but one thats a path, and one thats a classpath. (User Variables)
  2. Make a classpath identical to the 2 others in your system variables.

[quote=“RSPS Master, post:8, topic:351608”]Usagi, im trying to connect to Helix world.

Heres what my CLASSPATH is
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

And just PATH
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin

I have JDK 21.
Whats wrong.[/quote]
what’s wrong is simple, your classpath is set wrong, it should be identical to the path, adding the \bin;%CLASSPATH%; anyway…you have your classpath set to just program files, you need to have the (x86) its a completely different file. that should fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 + moparscape/clients = dont work
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Master1 RSPS Master
item.description:
@RSPS_Master1 wrote:

I Vain I:

If it’s saying error connecting to server; the server is offline, or the client is not allowed to connect.

That cant be true. ive tried every single sponsored server, even the regualr moparscape. None of them work.

Read full topic
